title: Constructivist-Based Technology Integration Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using fundamental educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Blended environment emphasizing learner-led experimentation and collaborative problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more technology integration design frameworks based on constructivist principles.
Learners develop two technology integration activity plans applicable to real educational scenarios.
Learners revise and improve technology integration strategy prototypes by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners write a report analyzing the pedagogical effectiveness of technology tools in blended learning environments.

resources: Case study materials related to educational technology

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
